---
params:
    name: "Protva"
    sep: NULL
    vars: NULL
    locale: "EN"
    year: 1978
    exclude: NULL
    fixedyear: false
    temp: false
    prec: false
    span: 5
    eol: "\n"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
title: "`r tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(params$name))`"
author: "`r switch(params$locale, 'EN' = 'Report produced by grwat R package', 'RU' = 'Отчет подготовлен с помощью пакета R grwat')`"
output: 
  html_document:
    # toc: true
    # number_sections: true
    # toc_float:
    #   collapsed: false
    #   smooth_scroll: false
documentclass: report
classoption: landscape
geometry: "left=1cm,right=1cm,top=1cm,bottom=2cm"
header-includes:
   #- \usepackage[T2A]{fontenc}
   - \usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
   #- \usepackage[russian]{babel}
   - \usepackage[fontsize=16pt]{scrextend}
   - \usepackage[table]{xcolor}
   - \usepackage{longtable}
   - \usepackage{booktabs}
#mainfont: Open Sans
---

<!-- Settings -->
```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(include=FALSE)

library(grwat)
gr_set_locale(params$locale)
```

# {.tabset}
```{r, include=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, }
message('\nGenerating hydrograph separation report for ', params$name, '\n')
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
if (params$locale == 'EN') {
  knitr::asis_output("## Hydrograph separation")
} else {
  knitr::asis_output("## Расчленение гидрографа {#separation}")
}
```


```{r, include=TRUE, results='asis', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.height=8, fig.width=11}
message(' > Plotting separation...\n')
gr_plot_sep(params$sep, years = params$vars$Year, layout = matrix(c(1,2,3,4), nrow=2, byrow=TRUE),
                   temp = params$temp, prec = params$prec, span = params$span,
                   pagebreak = FALSE)
```

<!-- Main plots -->
```{r, include=TRUE}
if (params$locale == 'EN') {
  knitr::asis_output("## Interannual changes")
} else {
  knitr::asis_output("## Межгодичные изменения {#interannual}")
}
```


```{r, include=TRUE, results='asis', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.height=8, fig.width=11}
message(' > Testing variables...\n')
tests = gr_test_vars(vars, 
                    year = params$year, 
                    exclude = params$exclude)

message(' > Plotting interannual changes...\n')
gr_plot_vars(vars, 
            exclude = params$exclude,
            tests = tests,
            layout = matrix(c(1,2,3,4), nrow=2, byrow=TRUE),
            pagebreak = FALSE)
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
if (params$locale == 'EN') {
  knitr::asis_output("## Long-term changes")
} else {
  knitr::asis_output("## Долгопериодные изменения {#longterm}")
}
```


```{r, fig.height=8, fig.width=11, warning=FALSE, include = TRUE, results='asis', echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
message(' > Plotting long-term changes...\n')
gr_plot_minmonth(vars, 
                year = params$year, 
                exclude = params$exclude, 
                tests = tests,
                pagebreak = FALSE)
```
```{r, fig.height=8, fig.width=11, warning=FALSE, include = TRUE, results='asis', echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
gr_plot_periods(vars,
               exclude = params$exclude,
               tests = tests,
               layout = matrix(1:8, nrow=4, byrow=TRUE),
               pagebreak = FALSE)
```

<!-- Stats -->
```{r, include=TRUE}
if (params$locale == 'EN') {
  knitr::asis_output("## Runoff matrices")
} else {
  knitr::asis_output("## Матрица расходов {#matrix}")
}
```

```{r, fig.height=5, fig.width=10, warning=FALSE, include = TRUE, results='asis', echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
message(' > Plotting runoff matrices...\n')
gr_plot_matrix(sep, type = 'runoff')
gr_plot_matrix(sep, type = 'season')
gr_plot_matrix(sep, type = 'component')
```

<!-- Stats -->
```{r, include=TRUE}
if (params$locale == 'EN') {
  knitr::asis_output("## Statistical tests")
} else {
  knitr::asis_output("## Тесты {#tests}")
}
```

<!-- Knit table to PDF -->
```{r, include = TRUE, results='asis', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
message(' > Kabling statistical tests...\n')
gr_kable_tests(tests, format = 'html')
gr_plot_tests(tests)
```
